Activity: Log in to the system, check emails, review project updates, and prepare a to-do list for the week.
Attend weekly team meeting to discuss the EHR collection progress and seasonal influenza trend analysis.
Contact @EHR Vendor Liaison to request updates on integration timelines and discuss any challenges faced.
Review EHR data requirements with @Clinical Lead to ensure all necessary data points are included.
Begin analyzing collected EHR data with @Data Analyst to identify gaps and issues.
Collaborate with @Quality Assurance Tester to outline testing strategies for the EHR system.
Review integration tests and EHR development documentation.
Send an end-of-day update email to @Clinical Lead and @IT Project Manager regarding daily progress.
